DOC.brief_summary: A randomised, multi-center study of daylight mediated photodynamic therapy (PDT) with Metvix in patients with multiple actinic keratosis on the face and/or scalp.
DOC.brief_title: A Randomized Multicenter Study of Daylight Mediated Photodynamic Therapy (PDT)
DOC.criteria: 18 years and older, 5 AK in face and scalp immunosuppression
